status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

fields.description:
h3. I've some problem to reinstall axway on Mac.
In start show this error

I'm a stupid :-)
I have installed xCode from appStore ... but I haven't never launched it !
After that (xCode first time downloads something), everything seems to work.

There is a alternative method to download SDK Android ? 
With a line command ?
Because with axway download, it does not work, maybe i have a slow connection.
Thanks

Hello, Do not install through the studio. You can download the Android SDK package in here http://dl.google.com/android/android-sdk_r21.1-macosx.zip . Now, put the unzip folder in a root directory and configure the directory in your studio by studio/preference/studio/platforms/android/ Android SDK home. Restart studio. Go to your Android SDK folder/tools/android. This will open Android SDK manager. Download and install the recommended SDK tools and build tools. Now restart the pc after the installation is done. Now check again in the studio. Android SDK should be configured. Let us know. Thanks.
Hello [~w33zy], Can you please follow up here? whats the update of your issue?
